qa.name: Timmy
qa.appearance: Small for his age, with glasses

json_to_edit.voice_over: Sometimes, the greatest heroes are the ones no one else can see.
json_to_edit.description: Timmy's invisible friend Whisper helps him stand up to bullies.
json_to_edit.name: Invisible Guardian
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Timmy's invisible friend Whisper helps him stand up to bullies on the school playground.

qa.action: Timmy sits alone on a bench in the busy school playground.

hf.action: Whisper appears next to Timmy, visible only to the audience.

tr.action: Timmy's tearful face as Whisper consoles him.

xc.action: A group of bullies approaches Timmy on the bench.

ka.action: Whisper leans in to give Timmy words of encouragement.

fn.action: Timmy's expression changes from fear to determination.

af.action: Timmy stands up to face the bullies, with Whisper beside him.

qo.action: The bullies back away, surprised by Timmy's newfound courage.

fp.action: Timmy smiles, looking at where Whisper stands invisibly.

va.action: Timmy joins other children in the playground, with Whisper fading away in the background.

edit_command: Add a new shot after each existing shot, showing Whisper's perspective or actions. Don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: Sometimes, the greatest heroes are the ones no one else can see.
updated_json.description: Timmy's invisible friend Whisper helps him stand up to bullies.
updated_json.name: Invisible Guardian
updated_json.scene_summary: Timmy's invisible friend Whisper helps him stand up to bullies on the school playground.

qa.action: Timmy sits alone on a bench in the busy school playground.

bx.action: From Whisper's perspective, we see Timmy looking small and vulnerable on the bench.

hf.action: Whisper appears next to Timmy, visible only to the audience.

yz.action: Whisper's translucent hand reaches out to comfort Timmy, passing through him.

tr.action: Timmy's tearful face as Whisper consoles him.

lm.action: Whisper floats protectively around Timmy, scanning the playground for threats.

xc.action: A group of bullies approaches Timmy on the bench.

nt.sfx_keywords: low threatening rumble, quickened ethereal pulse
nt.action: From Whisper's view, we see the bullies approaching, looking menacing and oversized.

ka.action: Whisper leans in to give Timmy words of encouragement.

pq.action: Whisper's face shows determination as it whispers words of courage to Timmy.

fn.action: Timmy's expression changes from fear to determination.

rs.action: Whisper's form grows brighter and more defined as Timmy's courage builds.

af.action: Timmy stands up to face the bullies, with Whisper beside him.

uv.sfx_keywords: triumphant magical swell, fading fearful whispers
uv.action: From Whisper's perspective, we see the bullies shrinking back as Timmy stands tall.

qo.action: The bullies back away, surprised by Timmy's newfound courage.

wx.action: Whisper beams with pride, its form glowing brighter as Timmy stands up for himself.

fp.action: Timmy smiles, looking at where Whisper stands invisibly.

cd.action: Whisper begins to fade, its job done, watching Timmy with a mixture of pride and sadness.

va.action: Timmy joins other children in the playground, with Whisper fading away in the background.

ef.sfx_keywords: distant playground sounds, soft magical hum
ef.action: From high above, we see Whisper's faint glow moving away from the playground, its mission accomplished.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot after each existing shot to show whisper's perspective or actions. this will effectively double the number of shots in the scene, alternating between timmy's and whisper's perspectives. we'll update the "number_of_shots" to reflect this change, and we'll add new shots to the "shots" object, updating the "list_display_order" accordingly. we'll create new shot keys using random two-letter combinations and insert them in the correct order. the new shots will focus on whisper's actions and perspective, complementing the existing shots and providing a deeper insight into the invisible friend's role in the scene.
